title: Inheritance & Polymorphism
concept: This level introduces parent-child classes, method overriding, super keyword, hierarchical inheritance and runtime polymorphism.

challenges.title: Single Inheritance — Full Name
challenges.description: Class Person has first and last name. Class Student extends Person. Method fullName() returns first + " " + last.

challenges.title: Overriding — Sound
challenges.description: Base class Animal has method sound() returning "Animal". Dog overrides to "Bark", Cat overrides to "Meow".

challenges.title: super Keyword
challenges.description: Class A has method greet() returning "Hi". Class B overrides greet() but still needs to call super.greet() and return "Hi Hello".

challenges.title: Employee → Developer
challenges.description: Class Employee with name and baseSalary. Developer extends Employee with bonus. Method totalSalary() returns baseSalary + bonus.

challenges.title: Runtime Polymorphism — Area
challenges.description: Parent Shape has area() returning 0. Circle and Rectangle override area(). Print area of shape depending on type.

challenges.title: Hierarchical Inheritance — Payment
challenges.description: Base class Payment has amount. CashPayment prints "Cash-amount". CardPayment prints "Card-amount".

challenges.title: Parent → Child Constructor Chain
challenges.description: Class A takes int x. Class B extends A and takes int x,y. Compute x+y and print.

challenges.title: Final Method Override Restriction
challenges.description: Parent has final int square(int x). Child has cube(int x). Read n and print square(n) then cube(n) on new line.

challenges.title: Protected Access
challenges.description: Parent A has protected int val. Child B adds n to val and prints.

challenges.title: Dynamic Dispatch — Vehicle
challenges.description: Vehicle class has drive() returning "Vehicle". Bike returns "Bike". Car returns "Car". Based on input print result.
